abstract: Amazon says it will offer same-day delivery service in several major U.S. cities.
snippet: Amazon says it will offer same-day delivery service in several major U.S. cities.
lead_paragraph: Amazon has announced that it will begin offering same-day delivery in several major U.S. cities. If something is ordered between 10 a.m. and 1 p.m. – the exact cut-off time differs by city – it can be delivered the same day in New York, Philadelphia, Boston, Washington, Baltimore, Las Vegas and Seattle. Three more cities – Chicago, Indianapolis and Phoenix – will be added soon.

headline.main: Amazon to Offer Same-Day Delivery in Several Cities
